code_snippet:
import sys
# pylint:disable=unused-argument,import-error

PY2 = sys.version_info[0] == 2
PY3 = sys.version_info[0] >= 3

if PY3:
    import builtins
    exec_ = getattr(builtins, "exec")

    def reraise(tp, value, tb=None):
        if value.__traceback__ is not tb:
            raise value.with_traceback(tb)
        raise value

    xrange = range
    string_types = (str,)
    text_type = str

else:
    def exec_(code, globs=None, locs=None):
        """Execute code in a namespace."""
        if globs is None:
            frame = sys._getframe(1)
            globs = frame.f_globals
            if locs is None:
                locs = frame.f_locals
            del frame
        elif locs is None:
            locs = globs
        exec("""exec code in globs, locs""")

    import __builtin__ as builtins
    xrange = builtins.xrange
    string_types = (builtins.basestring,)
    text_type = builtins.unicode

    exec_("""def reraise(tp, value, tb=None):
    try:
        raise tp, value, tb
    finally:
        tb = None
""")

mapped_sequence.description: Retrieves global symbol table as dictionary
Extracts current call stack as FrameSummary objects

PY2 = sys.version_info[0] == 2
PY3 = sys.version_info[0] >= 3

if PY3:
    import builtins
    exec_ = getattr(builtins, "exec")
    # ...
else:
    def exec_(code, globs=None, locs=None):
        if globs is None:
            frame = sys._getframe(1)
            globs = frame.f_globals
            if locs is None:
                locs = frame.f_locals
            del frame
        elif locs is None:
            locs = globs
        exec("""exec code in globs, locs""")
    import __builtin__ as builtins
    # ...
    exec_("""def reraise(tp, value, tb=None):
    try:
        raise tp, value, tb
    finally:
        tb = None
""")
